name: Linja vs. the Maneclowns - SAGE 2020 Demo
name_original: Linja vs. the Maneclowns - SAGE 2020 Demo
description:
Linja vs. the Maneclowns is wacky 2D action platformer focused on speed and mobility, that's currently in development. You can follow the development of the game over at our official Twitter page: https://twitter.com/LinjaProject

This is a demo submitted to SFGHQ's SAGExpo 2020, the current itch.io page has been uploaded as a mirror while the page for the demo is experiencing inconveniences.

Since the game is being actively worked on, we would love to see what you think of it once you're done with the demo! Please head over to this form in order to leave your feedback: https://forms.gle/rMfLXQkXrP24Nbvp7

The game is available to play in English and Spanish. Both Keyboard and Gamepad controllers are supported.

Thank you for your time!

Default controls (can be changed at any time in-game):

MovementArrow keys
Jump/Accept
VAir dash
XShuriken
ZSlice-through
CPauseEnterLook around
DChange weapon (previous)
AChage weapon (next)
S
